name: Caipora
description:
Caipora is represented in the form of a young Indian girl with reddish hair and greenish skin. It is considered one of the main protectors of animals and the forest.

It lives very well hidden inside the forest and appears when a hunter tries to harm an animal or the environment. Despite having short stature, legend says that the caipora has immense strength.

She attacks and attacks hunters with a lot of cruelty and malice. Often, she even kills anyone who approaches the forest with bad intentions.

Caipora comes from the Tupi-Guarani word “caapora” which means “forest inhabitant”. <Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
